name: Racing Track Crazy Dead Car
description:
It’s a driving simulator racing arena where you can win this stunt racing. Rush fast to the finish line in crazy stunt driving simulator. You are capable of stunt car racing and stunt car driving while your rush to crash the opponents racing. In this arcade game you race between blazing fires, accelerate your way through terrifying loops and crazy jumps.
Features:
.Impossible car racing on the level
.Extreme stunt car driving
.Sky high impossible tracks
.Real stunt car of fast speed
.Jump to ovoid the obstacle
